comment: Proof of ~ ax-8 from ~ df-clel (and FOL). This shows that ~ df-clel is "too powerful". A possible definition is given by ~ bj-df-clel . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.) Also a direct consequence of ~ eleq1w , which has essentially the same proof. (Proof modification is discouraged.)
